title: AnalyticCardCollection
description: AnalyticCard Collection is a container that manages and displays a set of ChartCards. ChartCards display a thumbnail view of a chart, with key information shown.

MaxItemCount.description: If MaxItemCount is not specified, then all cards are displayed in the section.

Visible.description: Set the visibility of this control.

Separators.description: To provide more flexibility with rendering of controls and sections, set the visibility of the separator lines.

AnalyticCard.description: Use for Dynamic Card Collection. This is the template for the analytic card for each entries in result defined from the `Target` property

Target.description:
Use only accompanied with `AnalyticCard` property.

 * For Dynamic Card Collection, use Target at the section level. More details: Refer to the examples below.
 * For Static Card Collection, use Target at the card level. More details: Refer to the examples below.

AnalyticCards.description: Use this for Static Card Collection. Each entries in this array represent an analytic card.

Footer.description: Footer bar to be displayed below this control's content section.

Header.description: Header bar to be displayed above this control's content section.

EmptySection.description: A section that will be displayed when the list is empty, this only applies if you are using Target binding. Allows you to show custom label when the list is empty.

DataSubscriptions.description: Array of data change events to subscribe to.
